humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report does not mention any positive lymph nodes or metastases in the regional or sentinel lymph nodes. Instead, it states 'pT4bpNOLOVORO', where 'pT4b' refers to the primary tumor invading the skin and 'N' followed by 'O' indicates no regional lymph node metastasis. Therefore, based on the given report, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pT4bpNOLOVORO' part of the diagnosis refers to the tumor (T) classification, not the lymph node (N) classification. The 'NO' in this part of the diagnosis indicates that there is no evidence of regional lymph node involvement. Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
